twoSetSkill.name: Creation of Honkai 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Boosts Total DMG by 20.0%. In Herrscher Form, attacks inflict Thunderblitz on enemies for 7s (cannot be stacked but can be refreshed). Enemies in Thunderblitz take 50.0% ATK of bonus Lightning DMG for each hit. CD: 1s.

threeSetSkill.name: Naga of Judgement 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Boosts Lightning DMG by 20.0%. Host takes 15.0% less Total DMG. Enemies in Thunderblitz take 15.0% bonus Lightning DMG.
